title.narrative: Malaria control and prevention in the Republic of Yemen.

description.narrative: 1- Reducing the spread of malaria epidemics by securing means of preventing disease transmission and reducing mortality. 2- Strengthening capacities and raising the readiness of hospitals and treatment centers and supporting them with diagnostic devices and equipment and developing the national program through experts to achieve the resilience of the health sector. 3- Raising the efficiency of workers in the health sector by training them on surveillance policies and procedures, epidemic preparedness, and how to limit the spread of epidemics 4- Raising community awareness through health education and awareness among the population, and clarifying the importance of the role of society in limiting the spread of the epidemic.
